sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le professeur nous guide pour écrire la thèse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher guides us in writing the thesis.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'habite au cinquième étage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I live on the fifth floor.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai très mal aux dents.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My teeth hurt a lot.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ça prend environ une heure.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It takes about an hour.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ ná yīxià nà běn shū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aide-moi à prendre ce livre, s'il te plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please help me get that book.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a poussé la porte avec force.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He pushed the door open with force.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这家公司从事运输业务。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā gōngsī cóngshì yùnshū yèwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette entreprise est dans le secteur du transport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This company is in the transportation business.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 早餐我吃了面包和牛奶。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zǎocān wǒ chī le miànbāo hé niúnǎi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Au petit-déjeuner, j'ai mangé du pain et du lait.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: For breakfast I had bread and milk.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā pāi le hěn duō zhàopiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a pris beaucoup de photos.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He took many photos.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 智能手机已经非常普及。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les smartphones sont déjà très répandus.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Smartphones have become very popular.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet endroit est vraiment beau !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This place is really beautiful!

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons saisir l'opportunité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must seize the opportunity.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dàjiā duì tā de píngjià hěn gāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tout le monde a une bonne opinion de lui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone has a high opinion of him.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Shanghai est dans l'est de la Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Shanghai is in eastern China.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 互联网改变了我们的生活。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hùliánwǎng gǎibiàn le wǒmen de shēnghuó.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Internet a changé notre vie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The Internet has changed our lives.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'agent de la circulation dirige le trafic au carrefour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The traffic police directs traffic at the intersection.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì gè yǒuqù de huàtí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un sujet intéressant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an interesting topic.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de diànnǎo tài lǎo le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon ordinateur est trop vieux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My computer is too old.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 自从毕业以来，我一直在这里工作。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zìcóng bìyè yǐlái, wǒ yīzhí zài zhèlǐ gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Depuis l'obtention de mon diplôme, je travaille ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Since graduation, I have been working here.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les arts martiaux chinois sont très célèbres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Chinese martial arts are very famous.
